岪岪岪

岪字的基本解释

岪
fú
〔岪郁〕（山势）曲折，如“其山则盘纡岪岪。”
半山腰上的路。

岪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fú］
［《廣韻》符弗切，入物，奉。］
亦作“1”。
(1)山势曲折貌。
(2)见“岪岪”。
(3)见“岪蔚”。

岪字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岪； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页309第21
【廣韻】敷勿切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】符勿切，?音佛。【說文】山脅道也。　又岪鬱，山貌。【司馬相如·子虛賦】盤紆岪鬱。　又【集韻】一作?。【楚辭·招隱士】山曲?。

岪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
岪字的起名意思

暂无。

岪
Basic explanation of words
岪
fú
〔岪岪〕(mountain) twists and turns, such as "the mountain is surrounded by 岪岪."
The road halfway up the mountain.
岪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fú］
["Guangyun" Fu Fuqi, into the object, Feng. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) The tortuous appearance of the mountain.
(2) See "岪岪".
(3) See "Ao Wei".
岪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岪; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 309 No. 21
[Guang Yun] Apply Do Not Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Fu Do Not Cut,? Yin Buddha. [Said the text] Yamawaki Road also.　Yuan Yu, mountain appearance. [Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu] Panyu Yuyu.　[Jiyun] One more work?. [Songs of Chu · Recruiting Hermits] Mountain Songs?.
岪
